column4: Albany Rd between Montavesta Rd and Tates Creek Rd
column5: The roadway is shut down to thru traffic.  The inbound right lane is also blocked on Tates Creek Rd.

column4: Outer loop Man O War Blvd at Buckhorn Dr
column5: At least one lane is blocked.  Tow truck enroute.

column4: Inbound Richmond Rd at Jacobson Park
column5: One lane is blocked due to a concrete spill.  Traffic is reportedly backed up toward Brenda Cowan Elementary School.
